name: server
description: Server part of the AppointDent project.

scripts.test: echo "This type of test is not yet defined"; exit 0
scripts.test:integration: npm run dropdb:services && npm run test-setup
scripts.wait-on:services: wait-on http://localhost:3002 http://localhost:3003 http://localhost:3004 http://localhost:3005 && npm run newman:services
scripts.prepare-for-test: dotenv -- concurrently "npm run start --prefix ../services/session-service" "npm run start --prefix ../services/appointment-service" "npm run start --prefix ../services/dentist-service" "npm run start --prefix ../services/notification-service" "npm run start --prefix ../services/patient-service"
scripts.newman:services: npm run newman --prefix ../services/appointment-service && npm run newman --prefix ../services/dentist-service && npm run newman --prefix ../services/notification-service && npm run newman --prefix ../services/patient-service
scripts.dropdb:services: npm run dropdb --prefix ../services/session-service && npm run dropdb --prefix ../services/appointment-service && npm run dropdb --prefix ../services/dentist-service && npm run dropdb --prefix ../services/notification-service && npm run dropdb --prefix ../services/patient-service
